name: Heimcloud
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Heimcloud cameras are designed to help you look after your home and family in a more convenient and smarter way – even when you’re away.
With the Heimcloud Skill and Alexa, you can now access your Heimcloud Camera via voice control by simply saying "Alexa,show me the Camera."

Before you get started, please make sure your Heimcloud device is online and updated to the latest firmware. 
To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button to link your Heimcloud account and discover your Heimcloud cameras. 

After linking your Heimcloud account and discovering your Heimcloud cameras in your Alexa account, you can start controlling your cameras. 

To look the camera of the front door camera, you can say: 
“Alexa，show me the front door camera”
“Alexa, talk to the front door camera” 

Compatible Heimcloud Cameras: 
Mate A1
Firmware version：YGT.WT-L20PK0501-v200903.1545 or higher;


Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices: 
-Echo Show 


*When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera. 
The name is equivalent to the location of where the camera was installed and can be found and configured in the Heimcloud app. 
You can also add Heimcloud cameras to new or existing groups in the Alexa app.
